name: Unnamed Rollercoaster Building Game
description:
Ever wanted to build and ride your own rollercoaster? Here, have both at the same time. No need to place struts on the ground and manually adjust their height: just ride.

Go through two riding locations: Canyon and the Peak. Spin, loop and drop as much as possible on your way to beat the trials!

Pre-Alpha

This is a Pre-Alpha version: the best opportunity to fiddle with and discuss the game. I welcome any feedback as it helps me to shape the game to it’s best possible self!

Everything is subject to change here (especially visuals) and it is you who can drive that change.

Feedback

It would mean a lot if you stop by and give me some feedback after playing. You can do it here:

  • On Discord server
  • On Reddit
  • By partaking in a Feedback Survey

And thanks for playing, you’re the best!
